main.name: Ryan Atanasoff
main.description: I'm a software engineer based in Madison, Wisconsin. This is my website. Make yourself at home.
main.bio: My name is Ryan but most people just call me Ryan. I'm originally from Dallas and I now live in Madison, Wisconsin with my lovely wife and our okay dog. I am interested in software development opportunities conducted remotely, and have a special interest in web development. I enjoy hiking, programming, and learning about decentralized finance/cryptocurrencies.

resume.skillmessage: These are my self-evaluated skill levels. Curious about their accuracy? Hire me and see for yourself!

work.title: Software Engineer II | DevOps Engineer
work.description: Led development and design of order processing for commercially owned multi-dwelling units and their residential tenants, which included discussing and implementing requirements to effectuate stakeholders' goals; participating in cross-team stand-up meetings; and developing new functionality within Siebel CRM.
work.description1: Assisted in developing new features for order processing and facilitating customer follow-up regarding unservicable addresses with facilities issues by implementing requirements to effectuate stakeholders' goals; participating in daily cross-team stand-up meetings; and developing new functionality for order processing within Siebel CRM.
work.description2: Created Python-based Jenkins jobs to automate previously manual tasks.
work.description3: Diagnosed and resolved user issues in end-to-end and production environments.

work.title: Software Engineer | Mobile Developer
work.description: Designed and developed new Android/iOS applications as well as new features for existing Android/iOS applications for clients using Appcelerator's JavaScript framework, Titanium.
work.description1: Developed offline functionality for pending tasks and new syncing feature for when device comes online.
work.description2: Created functional base package application from new and existing modules.

work.title: Software Engineer | Backend Developer
work.description: Implemented new service for simplified work-order processing using FlowTrac's in-house PHP framework.
work.description1: Conducted daily design and review meetings with stakeholders.

work.title: Intern | Data Visualizer
work.description: Created new data visualizations for professor's clustering, pathway alignment, and network alignment algorithms using the Cytoscape JavaScript library.
work.description2: Refactored Perl scripts into Python to generate visualization data.

work.title: Computer Science Program | Mentor
work.description: Tutored and provided general guidance to freshmen majoring in Computer Science.
